name: Nine till Void
description:
Nine till Void is an abstract, turn-based roguelike with a heavy focus on strategy through risk taking and resource management.

In Nine till Void, you have nine turns until... void: the level becomes unstable and collapse in on itself destroying everything in its path, including you. Everything costs you. One wrong move may be your last.

Features:

  • Procedurally generated levels
  • 22 different unlockable items
  • 3 devious enemy types
  • Challenge and strategy
  • Secrets for you to discover
  • A PDF game manual

Originally made for LD34 with the theme: Only two buttons.
